TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Projekt II vedrørende fast affald i Khorog (TJ-Khorog)

CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9078-IFT-46147
Project name: Khorog Solid Waste II project
Country: Tajikistan
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 46147
Funding source: EBRD and SECO
Type of contract: Goods and related services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 30.4.2018
Closing date: 22.6.2018, 14:00 local time
This invitation for tenders follows the general procurement notice for this project which was published on the EBRD website, procurement notices (www.ebrd.com) on 8707-GPN-46147 issued on 30.5.2017.

State Subsidiary Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali of Khorog City», hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends using part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the bank) and of a grant from the Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO) towards the cost of the Sub-project solid-waste management of Khorog city.
The purchaser now invites sealed tenders from suppliers for the following contract to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan and the grant:
KhoSWSP 003 - Procurement of waste containers. The contract includes the delivery of following items and the related services:
— containers with capacity in 0,80m3 with wheels for operation of garbage trucks with rear loading – 175 pcs,
— containers with capacity in 0,75m3 without wheels for operation of garbage trucks with side loading – 325 pcs,
— wheels for containers with a load of one wheel at least 155 kg – 300 pcs.
The delivery of all items under the contract with the related services should be completed within 4 months.
Tendering for contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank and of a grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

— the tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as free funds on current account, lines of credit dedicated to this project execution, or other similarly highly liquid financial means, in the amount not less than 90 % of the tender price per each lot to which the tenderer applies. The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. The similarity shall be based on the functions of machinery, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements,
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a nonrefundable fee of 100 USD in dollars or in Tajik Somoni according to the exchange rate of National Bank of Tajikistan at the payment date to the following bank account:
Dollar account:
Beneficiary: SSUE «Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali» of Khorog City
Beneficiary account: 20202972300005567000
Bank of beneficiary: Amonatbank branch #67 in Khorog city
Corr. account № 20402972316264
Tajik Somoni account:
“Amonatbank branch #67 in Khorog city”
Bank identification code: 350101626
Taxpayer identification number: 700000802
Correspondent account: 20402972316264

Upon receipt of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will promptly be dispatched by courier; however, no liability can be accepted for their loss or late delivery. In addition, if requested, the documents can be dispatched electronically after presentation by the prospective tenderer of an appropriate evidence of payment of the nonrefundable fee. In the event of discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.

All tenders must be accompanied by a tender security of 5 000 USD or its equivalent in Tajik Somoni according to the exchange rate of National Bank of Tajikistan at the date of such tender security issuance.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 14:00 (local time), 22.6.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:
State Committee on Investment and State Property Management of the Republic of Tajikistan,
Shotemur street 27, Dushanbe, Republic of Tajikistan, postal code: 734025
The applicable procurement rules are the bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (PP&R) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
A register of potential tenderers who have purchased the tender documents may be inspected at the address below.
Prospective tenderers may obtain further information from, and inspect and acquire the tender documents at, the following office:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Subsidiary State Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) «Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali» of Khorog City
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Republic of Tajikistan, postal code: 736000, Tel:

State Subsidiary Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali of Khorog City», hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends using part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the bank) and of a grant from the Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO) towards the cost of the Sub-project solid-waste management of Khorog city.
The purchaser now invites sealed tenders from suppliers for the following contract to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan and the grant:
KhoSWSP 003 - Procurement of waste containers. The contract includes the delivery of following items and the related services:
— containers with capacity in 0,80m3 with wheels for operation of garbage trucks with rear loading – 175 pcs,
— containers with capacity in 0,75m3 without wheels for operation of garbage trucks with side loading – 325 pcs,
— wheels for containers with a load of one wheel at least 155 kg – 300 pcs.
The delivery of all items under the contract with the related services should be completed within 4 months.
Tendering for contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank and of a grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

— the tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as free funds on current account, lines of credit dedicated to this project execution, or other similarly highly liquid financial means, in the amount not less than 90 % of the tender price per each lot to which the tenderer applies. The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. — Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.

CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9078-IFT-46147
Project name: Khorog Solid Waste II project
Country: Tajikistan
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 46147
Funding source: EBRD and SECO
Type of contract: Goods and related services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 30.4.2018
Closing date: 22.6.2018, 14:00 local time
This invitation for tenders follows the general procurement notice for this project which was published on the EBRD website, procurement notices (www.ebrd.com) on 8707-GPN-46147 issued on 30.5.2017.

State Subsidiary Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali of Khorog City», hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends using part of the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the bank) and of a grant from the Swiss State Secretariat for Economic Affairs (SECO) towards the cost of the Sub-project solid-waste management of Khorog city.
The purchaser now invites sealed tenders from suppliers for the following contract to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loan and the grant:
KhoSWSP 003 - Procurement of waste containers. The contract includes the delivery of following items and the related services:
— containers with capacity in 0,80m3 with wheels for operation of garbage trucks with rear loading – 175 pcs,
— containers with capacity in 0,75m3 without wheels for operation of garbage trucks with side loading – 325 pcs,
— wheels for containers with a load of one wheel at least 155 kg – 300 pcs.
The delivery of all items under the contract with the related services should be completed within 4 months.
Tendering for contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the bank and of a grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

— the tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as free funds on current account, lines of credit dedicated to this project execution, or other similarly highly liquid financial means, in the amount not less than 90 % of the tender price per each lot to which the tenderer applies. The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. The similarity shall be based on the functions of machinery, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements,
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a nonrefundable fee of 100 USD in dollars or in Tajik Somoni according to the exchange rate of National Bank of Tajikistan at the payment date to the following bank account:
Dollar account:
Beneficiary: SSUE «Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali» of Khorog City
Beneficiary account: 20202972300005567000
Bank of beneficiary: Amonatbank branch #67 in Khorog city
Corr. account № 20402972316264
Tajik Somoni account:
“Amonatbank branch #67 in Khorog city”
Bank identification code: 350101626
Taxpayer identification number: 700000802
Correspondent account: 20402972316264

Upon receipt of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will promptly be dispatched by courier; however, no liability can be accepted for their loss or late delivery. In addition, if requested, the documents can be dispatched electronically after presentation by the prospective tenderer of an appropriate evidence of payment of the nonrefundable fee. In the event of discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.

All tenders must be accompanied by a tender security of 5 000 USD or its equivalent in Tajik Somoni according to the exchange rate of National Bank of Tajikistan at the date of such tender security issuance.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 14:00 (local time), 22.6.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:
State Committee on Investment and State Property Management of the Republic of Tajikistan,
Shotemur street 27, Dushanbe, Republic of Tajikistan, postal code: 734025
The applicable procurement rules are the bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (PP&R) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
A register of potential tenderers who have purchased the tender documents may be inspected at the address below.
Prospective tenderers may obtain further information from, and inspect and acquire the tender documents at, the following office:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Subsidiary State Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) «Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali» of Khorog City
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Republic of Tajikistan, postal code: 736000, Tel:
